site.title: Ridgeway Personal Training | Stronger in 12 Weeks
site.description: Personal training and coaching built around your schedule—strength, mobility, and sustainable habits.

props.headline: Get stronger. Move better. Feel confident.
props.subheadline: Personal training for busy people—simple programs, real accountability, measurable progress.

items.title: 1:1 personal training
items.description: In-person sessions focused on strength, mobility, and injury-safe technique.

items.title: Small group training
items.description: Train with friends and stay motivated with a coach-led plan.

items.title: Online programming
items.description: Weekly workouts delivered to you with check-ins and progression tracking.

props.headline: A clear path to results
props.content: Week 1–2: baseline, mobility, and movement quality. Week 3–8: progressive strength and conditioning. Week 9–12: performance and habit lock-in. You’ll always know what we’re doing and why.

items.quote: I’m stronger and my back pain is gone. The plan was simple and it actually stuck.
items.author: Chris P.

items.question: Do I need to be in shape to start?
items.answer: No. We start at your level and build from there with safe progressions.

items.question: How often should I train?
items.answer: Most clients see great results with 2–3 sessions per week plus simple at-home work.

items.question: Can you work around old injuries?
items.answer: Yes. We prioritize technique, mobility, and exercises that respect your history.
